title: Dark Side Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to roleblock a player tonight. You will learn who they would have visited.
- Use 2 bees to remove all non-Sith players' conversion immunity tonight. Sith Commanding abilities can convert players with any roles tonight.
- Use 3 bees to make the factional kill instead convert a player to the Sith tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 2753
*Peace is a lie. There is only bzzzz.*
